mapper.select: SELECT p.player_id AS playerId, p.player_name AS playerName, pa.archetype_name AS archetypeName FROM PLAYER p INNER JOIN PRIMARY_ARCHETYPE pa ON p.primary_archetype_id = pa.primary_archetype_id ORDER BY p.player_id ASC

SELECT p.player_id AS playerId, p.player_name AS playerName, pa.archetype_name AS archetypeName FROM PLAYER p INNER JOIN PRIMARY_ARCHETYPE pa ON p.primary_archetype_id = pa.primary_archetype_id WHERE LOWER(pa.archetype_name) = LOWER(#{archetypeName}) ORDER BY p.player_id ASC
